alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 10:42AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Walker and north central Jefferson Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1042 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arkadelphia, or near Sumiton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gardendale, Sumiton, Dora, Adamsville, Warrior, Kimberly, Graysville, Morris, Brookside, Sipsey, West Jefferson, Cardiff, Rocky Hollow, Quinton, Sayre, Empire and Partridge Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
